note.p: Physician. Younger brother of John Lubbock. Worked in the City of London and held a commission in the 11th Kent Volunteers. MD, Paris, 1879. Assistant physician to the West London Hospital, 1881–94; Charing Cross Hospital, 1882–90. Lecturer on practical medicine, Charing Cross, 1882–5; curator of the museum, 1888–92.
